room_title: Escape room "Escape the Maniac" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: Didn't really know what to expect in the beginning. At first I was like this is gonna be cheesy. Turned out to have been an awesome time for my children and I. I think we have found a new addiction. Thanks William for everything! We thuroughly enjoyed it...

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Maniac" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: We had a blast in the Maniac room. We didn't escape, but all is well.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Maniac" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: We had so much fun escaping the maniac today! The puzzles in the room were great, and the interaction with “Skully” added a unique experience. Overall a great experience! I would highly recommend checking it out!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Maniac" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: Thought this was a great experience! My wife and I do a lot of escape rooms and we really enjoyed the maniac room!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Maniac" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: This is by far the best escape game that my girlfriend and I have done! We visited from Orlando couldn’t have ask for a such memorable time! Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Maniac" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: Did the manic room today and had a great time. The clues were nicely laid out and made you think. The owners are super nice! Plus they had a cute dog:) we will be coming back to try the music room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the Maniac" by Cryptic Rooms in Pensacola
review: Of the 5 or 6 escape room we have visited this was my favorite! The rooms are much larger than we have experienced in other cities. The owners are a great couple. We originally booked the Magical Musical Mystery room and had such a great time that we returned two days later for Escape the Maniac.
